Name: Lavanta
Review Text: The owner cooks the food herself and makes them as good as my mother. A must try Turkish food in Amsterdam. It is not like other fast food Turkish food you find in the city. This restaurant provides a diversity of rich Turkish cuisine. You can find super delicious vegan and vegetarian food, as well as meat options.

Name: Lavanta
Review Text: Nice place to taste some Mediterranean flavours, a lot of Turkish and Greek dishes. Meatballs, sarma and stuffed eggplants were very delicious.

Name: Lavanta
Review Text: Best Turkish food in townüòç I've just moved to the area and have eaten there already so often because it's sooo delicious! The ingredients are all fresh and really nice prepared - I just can‚Äôt resist on the way home. And the staff is very friendly as well :-) Definitively one of my new favorite restaurants in Amsterdam!

Name: Lavanta
Review Text: When I miss Turkish food, I go Lavanta (nearly everyday). However, don't expect to have d√∂ner or kebap here. Turkish cuisine is not just about d√∂ner or kebab. It's richer than you think. They have so many vegetarian foods as well, which Aegean area in Turkey is famous for

Name: Lavanta
Review Text: Had a very over priced yet very average wrap. They charged the full amount of aubergine wrap - despite missing many ingredients. It was basically aubergine salad wrapped with some lettuce pieces for 8 euros.

Name: Lavanta
Review Text: Ordered food through uber eats. Requested utensils but didn't get any. Now I have some food but nothing to eat it with

Name: Lavanta
Review Text: Great place to chill and enjoy turkish (aegean/greek type) food. B√∂rek m√ºkemmel.

Name: Lavanta
Review Text: Had our Saturday lunch takeout from here. Couscous, spinach, cucumber yogurt (like Indian raita) - everything was so well made, wholesome and homey. Want to go back, and try the meatballs next time!

Name: Lavanta
Review Text: Delicious , perfect Turkish foods with smily faces

Name: Lavanta
Review Text: Delicious food that reminds me of home. The ingredients are fresh and the chef(s) put that extra effort in making each dish taste great. This has always been one of my favorite go-to places for take-away or dine-in in this area, highly recommended for Mediterranean-style food options.

Name: Lavanta
Review Text: Must have: lamb moussaka! Also, due to corona, they diversified into wraps. Also very tasty! More expensive than regular wraps but totally worth it.

Name: Lavanta
Review Text: What a delightful surprise. As a vegetarian, I often look for Mediterranean food as there are typical many options. Strictly speaking, Lavanta isn't your traditional Mediterranean restaurant. It is deli style with a host of very fresh ‚Ä¶

Name: Lavanta
Review Text: Best Turkish food in Amsterdam proving that Turkish food is not only kebap. I have so far tried their usual menu, which I am a fan, but last Saturday I tried the recently introduced breakfast menu and it was delicious. I believe breakfast ‚Ä¶

Name: Lavanta
Review Text: Tasty Turkish food with good price!

Name: Lavanta
Review Text: Delicious and fresh dishes. No artificial flavors.

Name: Lavanta
Review Text: If you have never had eggplant or bell pepper dolmas, this is where you try them out first! Lavanta has the best dolmas you'll ever have. They also make the best homemade tzatziki. Whether you want to have dinner at their charming cozy ‚Ä¶

Name: Lavanta
Review Text: Always fresh and delicious food! Lovely owner. She is a great cook. She makes boreks, meatballs, dolma, soup, anything you want. Definitely a place I would recommend to everyone. You can also make special orders. I had a party and asked her ‚Ä¶

Name: Lavanta
Review Text: The best homemade Turkish food being sold in Amsterdam. Must try: okra with chickpeas ( #bamya) , eggplant with minced meat ( #karniyarik )

Name: Lavanta
Review Text: Love the food here. It tastes like home

Name: Lavanta
Review Text: This was really very yummy food. We ordered a wide range of vegetarian options and it was all more than good it was excellent. All of it. Big portions. Very fresh tasting. It was like eating homemade good food. Something few restaurants ‚Ä¶

Name: Lavanta
Review Text: Ate in, very good food, everything in display and you choose what you eat, they warm it up for you (still, very good). Lots of wine there on shelves but could not have it with food. Assumably licence only to sell out (?)

Name: Lavanta
Review Text: Everything we had here was amazing: dolmas, chicken, rice soup. Great vibes and right on jph. The fruit infused water is a great touch

Name: Lavanta

Review Text: I come here almost every week for some take-away and the lovely Turkish breakfast that they serve on the weekends.

Name: Lavanta

Name: Lavanta

Name: Lavanta
